amendment.description: To provide additional funds for programs relating to West Nile Virus and to fund the Mosquito Abatement for Safety and Health Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 1614 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1614 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 49. Record Vote Number: 345.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1614.

Amendment SA 1614 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11292-11293, S11308-11309; text: CR S11292) To provide additional funds for programs relating to West Nile Virus and to fund the Mosquito Abatement for Safety and Health Act.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1614 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 49. Record Vote Number: 345.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1614 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 1542.
